        private java.util.List<ServerAddress> lSA_Servers

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiscoveryClient

        public DiscoveryClient()
        This is the constructor for the Client-Discovery-Implementation.

        It automatically acquires the ServerIP and ServerPort and puts them into a list.

        IMPORTANT: Don't forget to start it after creating the class!

        Parameters:
        i_ServerPort - your Server's Port

    • Method Detail

      • ClearServerlist

        public void ClearServerlist()
        Clears the List of Servers it found so far.

      • GetList

        public java.util.List<ServerAddress> GetList()
        Returns:
        The Servers it discovered so far (unsorted).

      • Parse

        protected void Parse(java.net.DatagramPacket DP_MSG)

      • AlreadyFound

        private boolean AlreadyFound(java.net.InetAddress IA_Address,
                   int i_Port)
        Checks whether the Server is already in the List or not.

        It also checks whether the port is in a valid range or not.

        Parameters:
        IA_Address - The Server's IP
        i_Port - The Server's Port
        Returns:
        Whether the Server already is in the list or not.
